title: Arrivederci Roma
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Richard Zatorski and Geoffrey Wright
brief_description: A new Australian comes to grips with his first physical education swimming lesson and makes some friends along the way to the deep end. Set in the City Baths, Melbourne. Stars Bill Banks, Rob Forza, Claudio Avilla and John White.
